name: Creative Art Challenge
description: Unleash your artistic talents in this creative art challenge. Show us your unique vision and win exciting prizes!
taskSubmissionText: Submit your artwork in a high-resolution format. Include a brief description of your inspiration and creative process.

name: Coding Hackathon
description: Join our coding hackathon and showcase your coding skills. Solve real-world problems and compete for the top prize!
taskSubmissionText: Submit your code on GitHub and provide a link to a live demo. Include documentation for your solution.

name: Photography Contest
description: Capture the beauty of the world around you in our photography contest. Share your stunning photos and win recognition.
taskSubmissionText: Submit your photos in a digital format. Include details about the camera settings and location of each shot.

name: Writing Challenge
description: Express your thoughts and creativity in our writing challenge. Share your unique stories and perspectives.
taskSubmissionText: Submit your written piece in a readable format. Ensure it adheres to the specified word count and theme.

name: Cooking Showdown
description: Show off your culinary skills in our cooking showdown. Prepare delicious dishes and impress our judges!
taskSubmissionText: Submit a video of your cooking process and the final dish. Include the recipe and any special techniques you used.
